boardgame.name: Der Herr der Ringe Sammelkartenspiel
The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game
O Senhor dos Anéis: Jogo de Estampas Ilustradas
El Señor de los Anillos Juego de cartas coleccionables
boardgame.description: A tradeable card game covering the events of the Lord of the Rings movies. Frodo and his companions journey from Bag End to the destruction of the Ring at Mount Doom. The coverage of the cards is largely loyal to the movies, but it does take some of its lore from the book, and make references to certain atmospheres within the book. Some card sets, such as the Expanded Middle Earth Draft collection, have actors playing roles that were not seen in the movie, replete with costume. This allows for Tom Bombadil and Ghan Buri Ghan (among others) to be considered part of the card game. Nonetheless, they are rare, and typically you feel as if you are playing the movie rather than the book._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game will be fairly familiar to veteran CCG players with a couple of important exceptions: firstly, combat is magic-like in execution but more incremental in resolution: each _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;lost_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; combat results in only a wound, not elimination as in Magic, L5R, Star Wars, or most other CCGs. Each character can suffer a limited number of wounds before being eliminated, but this _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;health_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; rating is also expended for card special actions - there is no _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;tapping_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. Also importantly, this is not a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;draw one_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; game but a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;hand-filling_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; game, which results in a very different dynamic. Lastly, like ICEs Middle-Earth CCG that came before, cards are either _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;hero_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;shadow_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; cards; when you play Free Peoples cards in your turn, you effectively pay their cost in Twilight Points to your opponent, who then turns around and uses those points to play Shadow Cards to attack you._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As a final comment, Decipher finally saw the light and put a 4-card cap on every card during deck building (and this includes variations; so there is an Aragorn: Ranger of the North and an Aragorn: King in Exile; you can only have total of 4 combined). Additionally, there is a much more sane rarity distribution than previous Decipher products (many - in fact most - familiar characters are common or uncommon, or at least have common or uncommon variations that are no less powerful than the rare versions)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;ended_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; when Decipher ran into financial difficulties and let the license expire. The following sets were released:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 Fellowship of the Ring_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2 Mines of Moria_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;3 Realms of the Elf-Lords_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;4 The Two Towers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Battle of Helm's Deep_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;6 Ents of Fangorn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;7 Return of the King_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;8 Siege of Gondor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;9 Reflections_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;10 Mount Doom_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;11 Shadows (Starting with this Set, Minion Cultures were re-formatted)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;12 Black Rider_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;13 Bloodlines_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;14 Expanded Middle Earth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;15 The Hunters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;16 Wraith Collection_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;17 Rise of Saruman_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;18 Treachery and Deceit_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;19 Ages' End_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: This is quite simply, an IMMENSE collection. TONS of foils, rares, promos, you name it. easily 10,000+ cards through Reflections. The time has come to move on. You won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t find another collection like this. I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t even list all the rares, but you can ask anything, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll answer. (as long as it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s not for a listing) I have over two sets of the Tengwar cards, plus two whole sets of Countdown cards (with some extras) Believe me, this one is nutso! There are enough cards here for 3-4 people, easily.

~800 loose cards (mostly FOTR _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; TT), 1 opened starter deck (TT-Theoden), 2 sealed starter decks (ROTK-Aragorn _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; ROTK-Eomer) 4 sealed ROTK booster packs. Most of the loose cards are in good shape with some edge wear.

A long card box mostly full of LOTR ccg cards. There are intact Aragorn and Gandalf starter decks. Gimli and another Gandalf starter deck are in the mix, along with the contents of many boosters and copies of the rules. I did not scavenge any cards from these, so any rare cards that were in the boosters are still there. I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t think they put out any foil cards in those early card packs. Approximately 750 cards... all in very good shape. Plenty of fodder to learn this game and strategize your decks. Yours for 10$ and the cost of the stamps and packaging. Shipping cost is exact postage plus 1$ for packaging/handling. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll mail it anyway you want, parcel post, priority, or express. USA seller, with perfect ebay feedback I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll refer you to upon request. Note: Shipping to Europe and other nations outside the USA is expensive and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll only ship there to bidders with multiple positive feedback.
New Lord of the Rings starter decks, Shadows series.

ALL CARDS ARE MINT! RARES (some Promos where noted) Gandalf_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Hat Gandalf_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s staff, Ash Staff Jarnsmid Traveler_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Homestead Pallando, Far-Travelling One Gandalf_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Staff Gandalf, The White Rider Gandalf, Bearer of Obligation Aragorn, Isildur_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Heir Boromir, Defender of Minas Tirith x2 Faramir_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Sword Elessar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edict x2 Elendil, High-King of Gondor Brego, Loyal Steed Storied Homestead What Are We Waiting For? No Pause, No Spills x2 Loud and Strong x2 Beneath the Mountains Eomer, Heir to Meduseld Snowmane, Noble Mearas Windswept Homestead x2 A Promise x3 (2 from second set, 1 from 12th set) Frodo, Frenzied Fighter Bilbo, Melancholy Hobbit x2 (1 FOIL) Diversion x2 4th set promo of Sting in Elvish, no english. Humble Homestead Rosie Cotton, Barmaid Haldir, Sentry of the Golden Wood Hunters Release Promo FOIL Legolas, Of the Grey COmpany Galadriel, Sorceress of the Hidden Land x2 (1 FOIL) Long-Knives of Legolas Hadafang Orophin, Brother of Haldir FOIL Secret Sentinels x2 Fishing Boat Come Away Wild Light of Madness From Deep in Shadow Hillman Horde x4 Ready to Fall Leaping Blaze A Dunedain Event that is really good but all in Elvish (cannot recall the specific name, sorry) The mouth of Sauron, Lieutenant of Barad-Dur x2 Saruman, of Many Colours Staff of Saruman, Fallen Istar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Stave The Palantir of Orthanc Porter Troll Troll_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Keyward, Keeper of the Beast Orkish Worker Retribution Rallying Orc Orc Artisan Cave Troll_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Hammer, Unwieldly Cudgel x2 Cave Troll of Moria, Savage Menace Abiding Evil Barrage Watchful Orc Undisciplned Uruk Slaughterer Uruk Zealot x2 Broken in Defeat Uruk Decimator Force of Uruk-Hai Army of Uruk-Hai The Witch-King, Captain of the Nine Riders Ulaire Attea, Black Predator Ulaire Otsea, Black Specter Whip of Many Thongs x2 The Balrog, Flame of Udun Castamir of Umbar, Corsair Vandal Strange looking Men Poisonous Words x2 Messenger_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s mount x2 (the Mouth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Weapon) Caras Galadhon (FOIL promo) Neekerbreeker_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Bog FOIL promo Forests of Lothlorien I also have the Eowyn and Legolas starter deck boxes from Shadows set (MINT) with the Shadows rulebook inside each (MINT!) Within that I have random cards from the Shadows set mixed with the cards that came in those specific decks (some taken out years ago, cannot recall what) these are Commons and Uncommons (some Dwarf, Elf, Rohan, Orcs, Evil Men) Looking to get these to someone who will use them. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d prefer not to have to throw them out.

Selling my collection of cards. Note that the count of Commons and Uncommons *may* be slightly off due to human error! Set 1 - Fellowship of the Ring (206 cards) Commons = 128 Uncommons = 61 Premiums = 4: 2 x Aragorn King in Exile 2 x Gandalf The Grey Wizard Foil = 1: 202 - What is this new Devilry?, Uncommon Rares = 12: 28 - Wealth of Moria 71 - Durin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Secret 87 - A Wizard is Never Late 89 - Aragorn ranger of the North 140 - Spies of Saruman 147 - Uruk Guard 216 - Morgul Blade 229 - Ulaire Attea 264 - Orc Bowmen 279 - Thin and Stretched 282 - The Weight of a Legacy 314 - Stone Trolls Set 4 - The Two Towers (189 cards) Commons = 135 Uncommons = 39 Premiums = 2: 2 x Theoden Lord of the Mark Foil = 1: 206 - Uruk-Hai Patrol, Common Rares = 12: 33 - Saruman Rabble-Rouser 52 - My Axe is Notched 54 - Rest by Blind Night 100 - Shadowfax 133 - Ruins of Osgiliath 171 - Rest While You Can 173 - Saruman Black Traitor 174 - Saruman_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Staff Wizard Device 237 - Ithilien Wilderness 257 - Southron Veterans 274 - Firefoot 313 - Pippin Just a Nuisance Set 5 - Battle of Helm_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Deep (22 cards) Commons = 14 Uncommons = 6 Rares = 2: 16 - Down From The Hills 41 - The Are My People Set 6 - Ents of Fangorn (22 cards) Commons = 14 Uncommons = 6 Rares = 2: 11 - Toss Me 30 - Gandalf Mithrandir Promos (22 cards) 2 x The Balrog Durin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Bane (Set 0, P, #10, pre-release card) 2 x Saruman Servant of the Eye (Set 0, P, #11, Scrye Magazine) 18 x Various but all printed in Elvish (Tengwar), part of The Two Towers special box 2 x sealed Two Towers starter decks, each different Miscellaneous: A large poster Playmat with the layout and helpful hints. How to Play CD. A few rule books. The Two Towers checklist I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not interested in splitting the item - I just want to move it on. Shipping to Europe and UK only. Please request a shipping quite, but as a guide the cards weigh about 1.2Kg. Allow up to one month for international shipping (experience has taught me this!) PayPal only please.
I have 682 cards spread over the first four sets, a larger proportion from the first set. There are 44 rares and 188 uncommons (as determined by http://lotrtcgdb.com/sets/grand.html).

1 album of MINT/UNPLAYED cards (except for 5 cards which have slight wear/minor scratches on the edges: 1R147, 1R167, 1R175, 1R216, 1R264 of the Fellowship of the Ring set--I never got around to replacing these with MINT cards). This album contains a FULL SET of the Fellowship of the Ring (Premier Set), Mines of Moria (Expansion), and Realms of the Elf-Lords (Expansion). It also includes Promo Cards 1-18, 1 Fierce Promo Tattoo, 3 Promo Deck-Building Cards, and a MINT rulebook from each of the sets. $50.00 for album. Shipping will be an additional $14.95 for USPS Priority Mail (the album is heavy) to the United States only. Please note that I do not sell cards individually. US money orders only and no refunds/returns--Thank you for looking!
for Capt_WaRPed, geekauction.

This is a custom listing for Simon Waugh for both Lot #1 and #2. Shipping to Australia will be $48 via USPS priority mail international. Two different lots of LotR Trading Card game. The entire collection (both lots) can be purchased for $60 and can be shipped via USPS large priority mail box for $14. Lot 1: Starter deck lot plus extras for $30. Includes 8 starter decks. I think three of the decks may be missing one or two cars, which is why I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m including an assortment of 375 additional cards plus three unopened boosters from Mines of Moria set. The starters are 60 card preset decks (the starters do not include the 3 rare cards that were randomly inserted into the decks--these rares are integrated into the cards in my lot #2). The starters include: Gandalf (Fellowship of the Ring) Aragorn (Fellowship of the Ring), I note that this decki is missing one of the two Aragorn cards and one of the two Athelas cards. Gandalf (Mines of Moria) Gimli (Mines of Moria) Boromir (Realms of the Elf lords) Legolas (Realms of the Elf Lords) Theoden (Two Towers) Aragorn (Two Towers) This lot additionally includes a partial Theoden deck from Two Towers, an assortment of 370 cards from the Fellowship of the Ring expansion (37 uncommons, 340 commons). There may be a few of the commons that have more than 4x. The lot also includes three unopened Mines of Moria Boosters. Shipping for this lot will be $10 to the US via medium flat rate box. Other locations please inquire. Lot 2: My base collection of over 1000 cards available for $40. Includes 650+ cards from the Fellowship of the Ring set (68 rares, 230 uncommons, and over 350 commons). Over 200 cards from the Mines of Moria set (10 rares, 21 uncommons, and 170 commons); 44 cards from the Elf Lords expansion (4 rares, 10 uncommons, and 30 commons); and 11 cards from the Two Towers expansion (6 rares; 5 commons). In addition there are 5 promoes (0P2, Bill the Pony; 0P3, Fireworks; 0P7 Book of Mazarbul; 0P8 Galadrial_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Glade; 0P9, Phial of Galadriel). There are also additionally 18 foil cards. From the Fellowship set: 4 rare foils (1R125; 1R124; 1R120; 1R47), 3 uncommons (1U363; 1U215; 1U223) and 6 commons (1C298 x2; 1C326; 1C5; 1C18; 1C102). From the Mines of Moria Set: 1 rare (2R93); 3 uncommons (2U34; 2U13; 2U59); 1 uncommon from the Elf Lords set (3U58). Shipping for this lot will be $10 to the US via priority mail.

Happy to post (postage will depend on your location). Alternatively, happy for you to collect if are able to travel to Leytonstone, London in the UK (there will obviously be no postage then). If you are collecting in person, please do NOT pay via paypal. Any queries, please contact me at ashkevron1@hotmail.com. Willing to consider offers.

This is for the following: - Fellowship of the Ring Anthology boxed set (the shrinkwrap was removed, some of the cards were sleeved, none of the cards have been played with) - Two Towers Anthology boxed set (the shrinkwrap was removed, but otherwise everything is factory sealed) - Return of the King Anthology boxed set (the shrinkwrap was removed, but otherwise everything is factory sealed) - Battle of Helm_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Deep Eowyn Starter Deck (shrinkwrapped) - Battle of Helm_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Deep Legolas Starter Deck (shrinkwrapped) - Two Towers Theoden Starter Deck (shrinkwrapped) - Mines of Moria Gandalf Starter Deck (shrinkwrapped) Comes from a smoke-free home. If you have any specific questions, please email.

This is for 1988 different cards that have never been played. There are no foils, except a few from Reflections, and there are no duplicates. There are 591 rare cards in this collection. Cards are from the following sets: 330 cards - The Fellowship of the Ring 122 cards - Mines of Moria (complete set) 82 cards - Realms of the Elf-Lord (commons and rares only - no uncommon) 308 cards - The Two Towers 128 cards - Battle of Helm_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Deep (complete set) 128 cards - Ents of Fangorn (complete set) 338 cards - Return of the King 117 cards - Siege of Gondor 15 cards - Reflections 121 cards - Mount Doom 46 cards - Shadows 194 cards - Black Rider (complete set) 24 cards - Black Rider Legends 18 cards - Two Towers Anthology/Tengwar (complete set) 17 cards - RotK Anthology/Tengwar (complete set) Feel free to GM me for a complete card list if desired. All cards come from a smoke free home. Cards will be in binders and sleeve pages. Cards will be mailed in a large flat rate USPS priority box. Shipping will be a flat rate of $17 to anywhere in the USA. I am willing to ship internationally, but this is a heavy item and will be expensive! International buyers must pay all fees associated with international shipping. Trade offers are also welcome. Thanks for looking

Here is what I have: Mines of Moria Expansion: - 1 box of boosters (this contains 36 booster packs, 24 are unopened, the other 12 are opened). Exactly 395 cards - so one is missing. -=-=-=-=- The Fellowship of the Rings (original release): 6 boxes of boosters, including several starter decks. However, all the cards are mixed together, total is a bit more than 2650 cards. Want to mention that 3 of the boxes were basically almost all duplicates of each other. In the first release of the game, the initial distribution had problems like that, which they fixed in later distributions. So I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not charging for the duplicates, but they are included (doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t hurt to have extras, especially if free). -=-=-=- So about 3000 cards total. Thanks
